ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-14T01:01:29 [Issue ID 4000-440264] urn:comicvine:4000-440264 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 11:40:43. [Issue ID 1171998]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Ramone and Finn arrive in Mangapore to procure new employment from the Yakuza, only to find themselves the target of his two best assasins-Finn's ex-wife and her poly-metal synthetic sidekick! All-new cover by Cobra artist Antonio Fuso!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|--------------------|------------------------------------|------------------| | Reg | Regular Cover | Antonio Fuso | 1 | | Sub | Subscription Cover | Andy Clarke (a) & Chris Blythe (c) | 2 |
Note: The indicia for this issue mistakenly lists the indicia date as January 2013.
ComicInfo.Title: Mission To Mangapore Part 1
